mapper.select: select EMP_NO ,case when EMP_NM is null then '' else EMP_NM end as EMP_NM ,case when GRP_CD is null then '' else GRP_CD end as GRP_CD ,case when (SELECT * FROM GET_FORMAT_DATE(ENTER_DATE) p ) is null then '' else (SELECT * FROM GET_FORMAT_DATE(ENTER_DATE) p ) end as ENTER_DATE ,case when AUTH_CD is null then '' else AUTH_CD end as AUTH_CD ,case when (SELECT * FROM GET_CODE_NAME('1001', AUTH_CD) p ) is null then '' else (SELECT * FROM GET_CODE_NAME('1001', AUTH_CD) p ) end as AUTH_CDNM ,case when MOBILE_PHONENO is null then '' else MOBILE_PHONENO end as MOBILE_PHONENO ,case when EMAILID is null then '' else EMAILID end as EMAILID ,case when EXTENSION_NO is null then '' else EXTENSION_NO end as EXTENSION_NO ,PASSWORD ,case when NOTE is null then '' else NOTE end as NOTE from TORGANIZATION where EMP_NO <> 'superadmin'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TORGANIZATION (EMP_NO, EMP_NM, GRP_CD, ENTER_DATE, AUTH_CD, MOBILE_PHONENO, EMAILID, EXTENSION_NO, "PASSWORD", NOTE) VALUES (#{empNo}, #{empNm}, '1001', #{enterDate}, #{authCd}, #{mobilePhoneNo}, #{emailId}, #{extensionNo}, 'pwd12345', #{note});
mapper.update: UPDATE TORGANIZATION SET EMP_NM = #{empNm}, EXTENSION_NO = #{extensionNo}, AUTH_CD = #{authCd}, MOBILE_PHONENO = #{mobilePhoneNo}, EMAILID = #{emailId}, NOTE = #{note} WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}
mapper.select: select COUNT(case when EXTENSION_NO is null then '' else EXTENSION_NO end) as EXTENSION_NO from TORGANIZATION where EMP_NO <> 'superadmin' AND EXTENSION_NO = #{extensionNo}
select COUNT(case when EMP_NM is null then '' else EMP_NM end) as EMP_NM from TORGANIZATION where EMP_NO <> 'superadmin' AND EMP_NM = #{empNm}
